ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Its more likely to be religion.  I had a friend who went there and got slaughtered despite never having even seen a froggie before in his life.  I wonder if
ygData.messageBody:
Its more likely to be religion. I had a friend who went there and got
slaughtered despite never having even seen a froggie before in his life. I
wonder if any of us lorekeeper's out there has any charts showing the
effects of various religions on your factions?

Kitasi, loved by all
except in Qeynos and Freeport!

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 3:30 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking


From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

> I have yet to kill a froglok so my faction with them should be
indifferent.
> This should allow me to safely go whereever the spawn is for the Guise and
> pay someone to let me loot it.

My bard had never killed a froggie and went into Upper Guk for the first
time
last night. At 25th level I didn't run into anything higher than a few
blues.
And yet when I did run into blues they attacked me. I assume it's bard
hate.
Has anyone else had this problem in Guk? My monk went there for the first
time at 19th, and nothing attacked him, even though stuff was yellow and
even
red to him.

Crier Sharpsong

Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
CDI at http://www.pigging.com/



----- Original Message -----
From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 4:01 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking


> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Kitasi,
>
> You and I think alike:-)
>
> I have yet to kill a froglok so my faction with them should be
indifferent.
> This should allow me to safely go whereever the spawn is for the Guise and
> pay someone to let me loot it. Anyone have a idea of how much I should
> offer for the looting rights?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kimes, Dean W. [SMTP:Dean_Kimes@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 10:50 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Twinking
> >
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> > On the subject of twinking, or at least related to it. I would very
much
> > like to obtain a Guise of the Deceiver. Wait, don't flame me yet I know
> > its
> > No Drop. I would be willing to accompany a party to Lower Guk if they
are
> > going there anyhow and pay for the right to loot one off the assassin.
> > From
> > what I understand there are groups hunting him for his rare drop,
whatever
> > that is, that already have one for everyone in their party. I haven't
> > been
> > able to find anyone like this on E'ci but my higher level contacts are
> > limited. If anyone is going there and would be interested in minorly
> > twinking my poor little bard please let me know.
> >
> > There are several quests I'd like to explore and this is the only way
I'll
> > get the chance short of retiring my bard for about 6 months to build up
an
> > evil character.
> >
> > thank you for your time in this blatant request for aid and assistance.
> >
> > Kitasi
> > Lookin' to darken his horizons
> >
> >
> >
